settings.title: DESIGNED FOR A SMARTER YOU
settings.text: Elevate your daily performance with our brain and body-boosting formula ... all in one simple scoop.
settings.text-2: Simply stir a serving of NEUBRAIN™ with water for an effortless start to your day. Your morning ritual has never been easier.
settings.text-3: Enjoy all the perks of coffee without the drawbacks. No jitters, crashes, or digestive issues. Savor a delicious medium roast with a hint of cocoa.
settings.text-4: Optimized for athletes, students, biohackers, and everyone in between. Paleo, Keto, and Gluten-friendly.

settings.title: Lion’s Mane
settings.text:
The only mushroom with nootropic properties, Lion's Mane mushroom stimulates nerve growth factor (NGF), which in turn promotes brain plasticity, brain regeneration, memory, focus, mood balance, and overall brain health.*

Double Extracted, 100% Fruiting Body.
settings.text1:
Cordyceps increases oxygenation and the body's production of adenosine triphosphate (ATP), which is essential for delivering energy to the body. The boost in ATP supports sustained energy and rapid recovery.*

Double Extracted, 100% Fruiting Body.
settings.text2:
Naturally anti-inflammatory, immune boosting, and loaded with antioxidants for a healthier you.*

Double Extracted, 100% Fruiting Body.
settings.text3:
A superfood multi-tasker packed with zinc, iron, dietary fiber, and amino acids. This functional mushroom works to reduce stress, promote better sleep, and enhance the immune system to fight disease.*

Double Extracted, 100% Fruiting Body.
settings.text4:
Packed with indigestible fiber and polysaccharides the gut loves. This mushroom can positively regulate the balance of intestinal flora, helping them grow and support the metabolic process resulting in better absorption of foods and energy.*

Double Extracted, 100% Fruiting Body.
settings.text5:
Boosts Alpha brainwaves to promote a “wakeful relaxation” mind state while reducing caffeine jitters. Reduces stress and anxiety and improves focus and cognition.*

Premium, Clinically Dosed Compound.
settings.text6:
High-potency Tyrosine supports stress-depleted neurotransmitters needed for multitasking and peak mental performance. L-Tyrosine enhances mental drive through chemical signalers in the prefrontal cortex.*

Premium, Clinically Dosed Compound.
settings.text7:
Alpha GPC is a precursor to acetylcholine and supports the synthesis and emission of acetylcholine. Enhanced acetylcholine levels have been linked to better learning ability and sharper memory.*

Premium, Clinically Dosed Compound.
settings.text8:
Loaded with essential amino acids to promote glowing skin, shiny hair, healthy joints, and strong bones. Collagen is the most abundant protein in your body and extra consumption can help reduce the effects of aging.*

Type I and III Peptides, Hydrolyzed.
settings.text9:
We blend our formula with a hint of fair-trade and low-acidity coffee extract for the traditional taste you love, and an extra boost of energy. Loaded with antioxidants and here to put a smile on your face.

Fair-Trade, Low Acidity Extract.

settings.title:
Your perfect
morning ritual.
settings.text:
NEUBRAIN™, with 35% less caffeine than your regular coffee, uses caffeine-complementing ingredients to ensure all-day energy without the jitters or crashes.

Drink one serving to kick-start your day, and recharge when needed.

How to use:

  1. Add 10-12oz of water to one serving of NEUBRAIN.
  2. Froth or give it a quick stir.
  3. Add your favorite milk or sweetener as desired.
  4. Enjoy peak performance, all day long.

settings.title: WHAT TO EXPECT.
settings.text:
NEUBRAIN™ starts working within 20 minutes.

Initially, you'll experience a gentle uplift in alertness and energy.

This will be followed by enhanced focus, improved memory recall, and verbal fluidity.

Your concentration will expand, allowing for clearer and faster thinking. You'll find your mental agility boosted, motivation increased, and mood brightened. 

All without the jitters, anxiety, or afternoon crash.

settings.title: Result That get better over time.
settings.text:
The improvements you see from NEUBRAIN™ will steadily increase the longer you take it. 

NEUBRAIN™ is 100% natural. Unlike medication, it delivers measurable results that accumulate subtly over time.

We recommend drinking every day for optimal results.

settings.title: Scientifically proven to work.
settings.text:
All 10 ingredients in our formula are research-backed and clinically dosed, for both safety and effectiveness.

NEUBRAIN™ is the world's smartest coffee, with a clean formulation that works to enhance brain and body performance.

Helping you to work, play, live, and age smarter, NEUBRAIN™ is a smarter coffee for a smarter you.

settings.title:
SUSTAINABLE. TRACEABLE.
ETHICAL.
settings.text:
NEUBRAIN™ is the most eco-friendly, coffee-based supplement available.

Our ingredients are sustainably sourced and processed in GMP-certified, FDA-registered facilities. The product is packaged in recyclable pouches made from 20% post-consumer recycled (PCR) materials and certified by the Forest Sustainability Council (FSC).

We're on our way to achieving Climate Neutral certification and proudly collaborate with 1% for the Planet®, and No Kid Hungry®.

Each pouch sold contributes to feeding children in need and dedicates 1% of proceeds towards environmental preservation.

settings.title:
The World’s
Smartest Coffee.
settings.text:
We took everything you love about coffee, removed what you don’t, and added supplements to unlock your peak performance.

75mg per serving (35% less than a drip coffee)

Taste

Light and creamy medium roast coffee with subtle notes of cocoa.

Feeling

Clear, calm, and energized focus. Enhance your performance and get ready to take on the world.

Lab Tested

We test for purity, heavy metals, allergens, mycotoxins, and mold.

Double Extracted

Increases bioavailability of beta-glucans, triterpenes, triterpenoids, and sterols in our functional mushrooms.

No B.S.

We use the cleanest ingredients only. No starch. No myceliated oats.
settings.text1: Full Ingredient List: NEUBRAIN Mushroom Blend(Lion’s Mane, Cordyceps, Turkey Tail, Chaga, & Reishi),Coffee Extract, L-Theanine, L-Tyrosine, Alpha GPC, Collagen Peptides. Nothing else.

settings.title: Recommended by top health experts & performers
NEUBRAIN’S PROMISE
settings.text:
We pledge to provide you with clinically measured supplements, crafted from tested, raw, and potent ingredients, free from preservatives, artificial flavors, unneeded fillers, banned substances, or GMOs.

Our products are scientifically formulated, relying on clinical trials to ensure each ingredient serves a precise purpose. You can expect them to work exactly as they say. You should expect results, and we are here to provide them.

If you are not entirely satisfied for any reason, our return policy allows for a refund or exchange within 45 days from the shipping date. Your satisfaction is always our paramount concern.

settings.question: What is NeuBrain?
settings.answer:
NEUBRAIN™ is a matrix of 10 scientifically supported nootropics, adaptogens, and prebiotics. It's designed as a superior alternative to traditional coffee, aiming to optimize your brain and body performance.

Considered the world's smartest coffee, NEUBRAIN™ acts as a comprehensive optimizer for your brain and body, offering support for immediate cognitive function and long-term health.

settings.question: How does NeuBrain work?
settings.answer:
NEUBRAIN™ stands apart from other nootropics and coffee alternatives due to its advanced formulation strategy. It exclusively uses research-backed nootropics, adaptogens, and prebiotics that support nine crucial brand and body pathways: Energy, Brain Chemicals, Blood Flow, Brainwaves, Neuroprotection, Neuroregeneration, Immune System, Nervous System, and Digestive System.

By delivering enhanced forms of these ingredients at clinical range dosages, NEUBRIAN™ functions as a 'smart supplement,' designed to unlock your peak performance.

settings.question: What does NeuBrain feel like?
settings.answer:
Unlike conventional supplements that tend to focus only on one or two aspects of brain and body performance, NEUBRAIN™ is a comprehensive optimizer for your entire brain and body. It's formulated to foster an adaptive state of peak performance.

The benefits of NEUBRAIN™ are versatile: In the workspace, it could enhance your multitasking abilities or single-task focus.

When exercising, it may fuel your motivation and drive.

When preparing for an outdoor adventure, it can boost your energy levels to face any challenges ahead.

For learners, it may improve studying capacity and bring calm, clear focus during exams.

In social situations, NEUBRAIN™ may promote relaxation, a brighter mood, and fluid communication skills.

settings.question: What does NeuBrain taste like?
settings.answer:
NEUBRAIN™ was developed to become your new morning ritual, a refreshing alternative to your regular coffee.

We've crafted a medium roast blend with hints of cocoa to not only tantalize your taste buds but also fill your kitchen with a delightful aroma.

NEUBRAIN™ is easy to prepare and provides you with enduring energy throughout the day, minus the jitters, anxiety, or afternoon coffee often associated with regular coffee.
